attributes.action: Remove voting rights from non-UK citizens and require proof of citizenship on first registration on the electoral roll.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
About 988,000 non-British citizens from 50 Commonwealth countries are entitled to vote under a 90-year-old convention as long as they are resident in Britain.

This means that in the event of a close election you have a system where non-British citizens may decide who wins. This is unacceptable.

This petition asks for voting rights to be restricted to British citizens.  They should not be given out to anybody who is a simply a resident.
